DOC.brief_summary: Heart failure with normal ejection fraction is often under diagnosed and certainly under treated in hemodialyzed patients. Because of the benefit of reducing heart rate, ivabradine, a pure heart-rate lowering agent without effects on blood pressure, is of potential therapeutic utility.
DOC.brief_title: Heart Failure With Normal Ejection Fraction (HFNEF) in Hemodialysed Patients: Beneficial Effect of Ivabradine
DOC.criteria: hemodialyzed patients signs and symptoms of heart failure with normal ejection fraction sinus rhythm atrial fibrillation/atrial flutter valvular heart disease unstable angina hospitalization for heart failure prior 3 months
